Civil subjects shall bear civil liability, administrative liability, and criminal liability if they should for the same act. Bearing administrative liability or criminal liability does not affect the assumption of civil liability. If the property of a civil subject is insufficient to pay, priority shall be given to the assumption of civil liability.

Chapter 9 Statute of Limitations on Lawsuits.
zh_law_content:
民事主体因同一行为应当承担民事责任、行政责任和刑事责任的，承担行政责任或者刑事责任不影响承担民事责任；民事主体的财产不足以支付的，优先用于承担民事责任。

 

第九章诉讼时效

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百八十八条
law_content: The statute of limitations for requesting protection of civil rights through litigation is three years, unless otherwise provided by law. The period of limitation for filing a lawsuit starts from the date when the right holder becomes aware or should have been aware of the damage to their rights and the obligation of the party. However, if more than twenty years have passed since the date of the damage to the rights, the People's Court will not provide protection. In special circumstances, the People's Court may decide to extend the limitation period upon the application of the right holder.
zh_law_content:
向人民法院请求保护民事权利的诉讼时效期间为三年。法律另有规定的，依照其规定。

 

诉讼时效期间自权利人知道或者应当知道权利受到损害以及义务人之日起计算。法律另有规定的，依照其规定。但是自权利受到损害之日起超过二十年的，人民法院不予保护；有特殊情况的，人民法院可以根据权利人的申请决定延长。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百八十九条
law_content: If the parties agree to fulfill the same debt in stages, the prescription period for filing a lawsuit shall be calculated from the date on which the final installment is due.
zh_law_content: 当事人约定同一债务分期履行的，诉讼时效期间自最后一期履行期限届满之日起计算。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十条
law_content: The statute of limitations for the right of an incapacitated or limited capacity person to bring a lawsuit against their legal representative starts from the date of termination of such legal representation.
zh_law_content: 无民事行为能力人或者限制民事行为能力人对其法定代理人的请求权的诉讼时效期间，自该法定代理终止之日起计算。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十一条
law_content: The statute of limitations for the claim for compensation for damages suffered by minors as a result of sexual assault shall be calculated from the day when the victim reaches the age of eighteen.
zh_law_content: 未成年人遭受性侵害的损害赔偿请求权的诉讼时效期间，自受害人年满十八周岁之日起计算。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十二条
law_content:
If the statute of limitations expires during the litigation period, the obligor may raise a defense of non-performance.

 

After the expiration of the statute of limitations, the obligor shall not be allowed to raise the defense of the statute of limitations as a reason for non-performance if they agree to fulfill their obligations. If the obligor has already voluntarily fulfilled their obligations, they shall not be entitled to request a refund.
zh_law_content:
诉讼时效期间届满的，义务人可以提出不履行义务的抗辩。

 

诉讼时效期间届满后，义务人同意履行的，不得以诉讼时效期间届满为由抗辩；义务人已自愿履行的，不得请求返还。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十三条
law_content: The people's court may not proactively apply the provisions on statute of limitations in litigation.
zh_law_content: 人民法院不得主动适用诉讼时效的规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十四条
zh_law_content:
在诉讼时效期间的最后六个月内，因下列障碍，不能行使请求权的，诉讼时效中止：

 

（一）不可抗力；

 

（二）无民事行为能力人或者限制民事行为能力人没有法定代理人，或者法定代理人死亡、丧失民事行为能力、丧失代理权；

 

（三）继承开始后未确定继承人或者遗产管理人；

 

（四）权利人被义务人或者其他人控制；

 

（五）其他导致权利人不能行使请求权的障碍。

 

自中止时效的原因消除之日起满六个月，诉讼时效期间届满。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十五条
zh_law_content:
有下列情形之一的，诉讼时效中断，从中断、有关程序终结时起，诉讼时效期间重新计算：

 

（一）权利人向义务人提出履行请求；

 

（二）义务人同意履行义务；

 

（三）权利人提起诉讼或者申请仲裁；

 

（四）与提起诉讼或者申请仲裁具有同等效力的其他情形。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十六条
zh_law_content:
下列请求权不适用诉讼时效的规定：

 

（一）请求停止侵害、排除妨碍、消除危险；

 

（二）不动产物权和登记的动产物权的权利人请求返还财产；

 

（三）请求支付抚养费、赡养费或者扶养费；

 

（四）依法不适用诉讼时效的其他请求权。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十七条
law_content:
The period, calculation method, and reasons for suspension or interruption of the statute of limitations in litigation are stipulated by law, and any agreements made by the parties are deemed invalid.

The preemption of the statute of limitations benefit by the parties is invalid.
zh_law_content:
诉讼时效的期间、计算方法以及中止、中断的事由由法律规定，当事人约定无效。

 

当事人对诉讼时效利益的预先放弃无效。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十八条
law_content: The law provides regulations on the statute of limitations for arbitration cases, which should be followed when applicable. In cases where there are no specific regulations, the statute of limitations for litigation shall apply.
zh_law_content: 法律对仲裁时效有规定的，依照其规定；没有规定的，适用诉讼时效的规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第一百九十九条
law_content:
The period for the existence of the rights of revocation, termination, etc., as stipulated by law or agreed upon by the parties, shall be calculated from the date on which the rights holder knows or should have known of the existence of the rights, unless otherwise provided by law. The provisions regarding the suspension, interruption, and extension of the statute of limitations do not apply. Upon the expiration of the period, the rights of revocation, termination, etc., shall cease to exist.

Chapter X Calculation of Periods
zh_law_content:
法律规定或者当事人约定的撤销权、解除权等权利的存续期间，除法律另有规定外，自权利人知道或者应当知道权利产生之日起计算，不适用有关诉讼时效中止、中断和延长的规定。存续期间届满，撤销权、解除权等权利消灭。

 

第十章期间计算

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第二百条
law_content: The time period referred to in civil law is calculated in terms of the Gregorian calendar year, month, day, and hour.
zh_law_content: 民法所称的期间按照公历年、月、日、小时计算。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第二百零一条
law_content:
When calculating a period, the starting day is not included and it begins from the following day, counting by year, month, and day.

When calculating a period by hours, it starts from the legally established or mutually agreed upon time according to the law or the parties involved.
zh_law_content:
按照年、月、日计算期间的，开始的当日不计入，自下一日开始计算。

 

按照小时计算期间的，自法律规定或者当事人约定的时间开始计算。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第二百零二条
law_content: The period is calculated by year and month, and the corresponding day of the month is the last day of the period. If there is no corresponding day, the last day of the period is the last day of the month.
zh_law_content: 按照年、月计算期间的，到期月的对应日为期间的最后一日；没有对应日的，月末日为期间的最后一日。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第二百零三条
law_content:
If the last day of a period falls on a statutory holiday, the day following the statutory holiday shall be considered as the last day of the period.

The deadline for the last day of a period is 24:00; if there is business hours, the deadline for business activities shall be the deadline.
zh_law_content:
期间的最后一日是法定休假日的，以法定休假日结束的次日为期间的最后一日。

 

期间的最后一日的截止时间为二十四时；有业务时间的，停止业务活动的时间为截止时间。

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第二百零四条
law_content:
During the period, the calculation method shall be in accordance with the provisions of this Law, except where there are other provisions in the law or other agreements between the parties. 

Chapter 11 Supplementary Provisions.
zh_law_content:
期间的计算方法依照本法的规定，但是法律另有规定或者当事人另有约定的除外。

 

第十一章附则

law_name: 中华人民共和国民法总则第二百零五条
law_content: In civil law, the terms "以上" (including the exact number or amount mentioned and above), "以下" (including the exact number or amount mentioned and below), "以内" (including the exact number or amount mentioned and within), and "届满" (including the exact number or amount mentioned and up to) are inclusive. On the other hand, the terms "不满" (excluding the exact number or amount mentioned but less than it), "超过" (excluding the exact number or amount mentioned but more than it), and "以外" (excluding the exact number or amount mentioned and beyond) are exclusive.
zh_law_content: 民法所称的“以上”“以下”“以内”“届满”，包括本数；所称的“不满”“超过”“以外”，不包括本数。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一条
law_content: In order to standardize the organization and behavior of the company, protect the legitimate rights and interests of the company, shareholders, and creditors, safeguard social and economic order, and promote the development of the socialist market economy, this law is formulated.
zh_law_content: 为了规范公司的组织和行为，保护公司、股东和债权人的合法权益，维护社会经济秩序，促进社会主义市场经济的发展，制定本法。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二条
law_content: The term "corporation" referred to in this law refers to limited liability companies and joint stock limited companies established within the territory of China in accordance with this law.
zh_law_content: 本法所称公司是指依照本法在中国境内设立的有限责任公司和股份有限公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三条
law_content:
The company is a legal entity with separate legal property and enjoys the right to corporate property. The company is liable for its debts with all its property.

Shareholders of a limited liability company are only liable to the company up to the amount of their subscribed capital; shareholders of a joint stock limited company are only liable to the company up to the amount of their subscribed shares.
zh_law_content:
公司是企业法人，有独立的法人财产，享有法人财产权。公司以其全部财产对公司的债务承担责任。

　　有限责任公司的股东以其认缴的出资额为限对公司承担责任；股份有限公司的股东以其认购的股份为限对公司承担责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四条
law_content: Shareholders of the company have the right to enjoy asset benefits, participate in significant decision-making, and select managers in accordance with the law.
zh_law_content: 公司股东依法享有资产收益、参与重大决策和选择管理者等权利。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五条
law_content:
Companies engaged in business activities must comply with laws and regulations, adhere to social ethics and business morals, be honest and trustworthy, accept government and public supervision, and assume social responsibilities.

The legitimate rights and interests of companies are protected by law and shall not be infringed.
zh_law_content:
公司从事经营活动，必须遵守法律、行政法规，遵守社会公德、商业道德，诚实守信，接受政府和社会公众的监督，承担社会责任。

　　公司的合法权益受法律保护，不受侵犯。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六条
law_content:
When establishing a company, it should apply for registration to the competent authority in accordance with the law. If the establishment conditions prescribed in this law are met, it will be registered as a limited liability company or a joint stock limited company by the company registration authority. Those that do not meet the establishment conditions prescribed in this law shall not be registered as limited liability companies or joint stock limited companies.

If it is required by law or administrative regulations to obtain approval for the establishment of a company, the necessary approval procedures must be completed before company registration.

The public can apply to the company registration authority to inquire about the registration matters of a company, and the company registration authority should provide inquiry services.
zh_law_content:
设立公司，应当依法向公司登记机关申请设立登记。符合本法规定的设立条 件的，由公司登记机关分别登记为有限责任公司或者股份有限公司；不符合本法规定的设立条 件的，不得登记为有限责任公司或者股份有限公司。

　　法律、行政法规规定设立公司必须报经批准的，应当在公司登记前依法办理批准手续。

　　公众可以向公司登记机关申请查询公司登记事项，公司登记机关应当提供查询服务。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七条
law_content:
A company established in accordance with the law is issued a business license by the company registration authority. The date of issuance of the business license is the date of establishment of the company.

The business license of the company should include information such as the company's name, address, registered capital, scope of business, and the name of the legal representative.

If there is any change in the information recorded in the business license, the company should go through the change registration procedure according to the law, and the company registration authority will issue a new business license.
zh_law_content:
依法设立的公司，由公司登记机关发给公司营业执照。公司营业执照签发日期为公司成立日期。

　　公司营业执照应当载明公司的名称、住所、注册资本、经营范围、法定代表人姓名等事项。

　　公司营业执照记载的事项发生变更的，公司应当依法办理变更登记，由公司登记机关换发营业执照。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八条
law_content:
A limited liability company established under this Law must indicate "Limited Liability Company" or "Limited Company" in its company name.

A joint-stock limited company established under this Law must indicate "Joint-Stock Limited Company" or "Joint-Stock Company" in its company name.
zh_law_content:
依照本法设立的有限责任公司，必须在公司名称中标明有限责任公司或者有限公司字样。

　　依照本法设立的股份有限公司，必须在公司名称中标明股份有限公司或者股份公司字样。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九条
law_content:
A limited liability company shall meet the requirements of a limited liability company as stipulated in this law when changing to a joint stock limited company. A joint stock limited company shall meet the requirements of a limited liability company as stipulated in this law when changing to a limited liability company.

In the event that a limited liability company changes to a joint stock limited company or a joint stock limited company changes to a limited liability company, the rights and obligations of the company before the change shall be assumed by the company after the change.
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司变更为股份有限公司，应当符合本法规定的股份有限公司的条 件。股份有限公司变更为有限责任公司，应当符合本法规定的有限责任公司的条 件。

　　有限责任公司变更为股份有限公司的，或者股份有限公司变更为有限责任公司的，公司变更前的债权、债务由变更后的公司承继。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十条
law_content: The company is domiciled at its principal office location.
zh_law_content: 公司以其主要办事机构所在地为住所。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十一条
law_content: Establishing a company must be carried out in accordance with the law, and a company bylaw must be formulated. The company bylaw has binding effects on the company, shareholders, directors, supervisors, and senior management personnel.
zh_law_content: 设立公司必须依法制定公司章程。公司章程对公司、股东、董事、监事、高级管理人员具有约束力。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十二条
law_content:
The business scope of a company is determined and registered according to the company's articles of association. The company can modify its articles of association to change its business scope, but it needs to go through a registration process for the changes.

Projects within the business scope of a company that require approval according to laws and administrative regulations should obtain the necessary approvals in accordance with the law.
zh_law_content:
公司的经营范围由公司章程规定，并依法登记。公司可以修改公司章程，改变经营范围，但是应当办理变更登记。

　　公司的经营范围中属于法律、行政法规规定须经批准的项目，应当依法经过批准。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十三条
law_content: The legal representative of a company shall be appointed by the chairman of the board, the executive director, or the manager in accordance with the company's articles of association and shall be registered in accordance with the law. In the event of a change in the legal representative of the company, registration of the change shall be made.
zh_law_content: 公司法定代表人依照公司章程的规定，由董事长、执行董事或者经理担任，并依法登记。公司法定代表人变更，应当办理变更登记。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十四条
law_content:
A company can establish branch offices. To establish a branch office, an application for registration must be submitted to the company registration authority to obtain a business license. Branch offices do not have legal personality, and their civil liabilities are assumed by the company.

A company can also establish subsidiary companies, which possess legal personality and independently assume civil liabilities in accordance with the law.
zh_law_content:
公司可以设立分公司。设立分公司，应当向公司登记机关申请登记，领取营业执照。分公司不具有法人资格，其民事责任由公司承担。

　　公司可以设立子公司，子公司具有法人资格，依法独立承担民事责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十五条
law_content: A company can invest in other enterprises; however, unless otherwise stipulated by law, it shall not become a joint creditor with liability for the invested enterprise.
zh_law_content: 公司可以向其他企业投资；但是，除法律另有规定外，不得成为对所投资企业的债务承担连带责任的出资人。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十六条
law_content:
According to the company's articles of association, the company can make investments in other companies or provide guarantees for others, which requires resolutions by the board of directors, general meeting of shareholders, or shareholders' meeting. If the articles of association specify limits on the total amount or individual amounts of investments or guarantees, these limits must not be exceeded.

If the company provides guarantees for the shareholders or actual controllers of the company, it must be approved by a resolution of the general meeting of shareholders or shareholders' meeting.

Shareholders or actual controllers mentioned in the preceding paragraph are not allowed to participate in the voting for the matters mentioned in the preceding paragraph. The approval for such matters should be obtained from the majority of the voting rights held by the attending shareholders at the meeting.
zh_law_content:
公司向其他企业投资或者为他人提供担保，依照公司章程的规定，由董事会或者股东会、股东大会决议；公司章程对投资或者担保的总额及单项投资或者担保的数额有限额规定的，不得超过规定的限额。

　　公司为公司股东或者实际控制人提供担保的，必须经股东会或者股东大会决议。

　　前款规定的股东或者受前款规定的实际控制人支配的股东，不得参加前款规定事项的表决。该项表决由出席会议的其他股东所持表决权的过半数通过。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十七条
law_content:
The company must protect the legitimate rights and interests of employees, sign labor contracts with them in accordance with the law, participate in social insurance, strengthen labor protection, and achieve safe production.

The company should use various forms to enhance the vocational education and job training of its employees, and improve their skills and qualifications.
zh_law_content:
公司必须保护职工的合法权益，依法与职工签订劳动合同，参加社会保险，加强劳动保护，实现安全生产。

　　公司应当采用多种形式，加强公司职工的职业教育和岗位培训，提高职工素质。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十八条
law_content:
According to the Trade Union Law of the People's Republic of China, employees in the company can organize trade unions and carry out union activities to protect the legitimate rights and interests of employees. The company is required to provide necessary conditions for the activities of the company's trade unions. The trade union representatives of the company negotiate and sign collective contracts with the company on issues such as labor remuneration, working hours, benefits, insurance, and labor safety and health, in accordance with the law.

The company implements democratic management through the employee congress or other forms, in accordance with the Constitution and relevant laws.

When the company discusses and decides on major issues related to restructuring and operations, as well as formulating important rules and regulations, it should seek the opinions of the company's trade union and listen to the opinions and suggestions of the employees through the employee congress or other forms.
zh_law_content:
公司职工依照《中华人民共和国工会法》组织工会，开展工会活动，维护职工合法权益。公司应当为本公司工会提供必要的活动条 件。公司工会代表职工就职工的劳动报酬、工作时间、福利、保险和劳动安全卫生等事项依法与公司签订集体合同。

　　公司依照宪法和有关法律的规定，通过职工代表大会或者其他形式，实行民主管理。

　　公司研究决定改制以及经营方面的重大问题、制定重要的规章制度时，应当听取公司工会的意见，并通过职工代表大会或者其他形式听取职工的意见和建议。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第十九条
law_content: In a company, according to the provisions of the Constitution of the Communist Party of China, the establishment of the Communist Party of China's organization and the conduct of party activities. The company shall provide necessary conditions for the activities of the party organization.
zh_law_content: 在公司中，根据中国共产党章程的规定，设立中国共产党的组织，开展党的活动。公司应当为党组织的活动提供必要条 件。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十条
law_content:
Shareholders of the company shall comply with laws, administrative regulations, and the company's articles of association, and exercise shareholder rights in accordance with the law. They shall not abuse shareholder rights to harm the interests of the company or other shareholders. They shall not abuse the company's corporate independent position and limited liability of shareholders to harm the interests of creditors.

Shareholders who abuse shareholder rights and cause losses to the company or other shareholders shall bear liability for compensation in accordance with the law.

Shareholders who abuse the company's corporate independent position and limited liability of shareholders, evade debts, and seriously harm the interests of creditors shall assume joint liability for the company's debts.
zh_law_content:
公司股东应当遵守法律、行政法规和公司章程，依法行使股东权利，不得滥用股东权利损害公司或者其他股东的利益；不得滥用公司法人独立地位和股东有限责任损害公司债权人的利益。

　　公司股东滥用股东权利给公司或者其他股东造成损失的，应当依法承担赔偿责任。

　　公司股东滥用公司法人独立地位和股东有限责任，逃避债务，严重损害公司债权人利益的，应当对公司债务承担连带责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十一条
law_content:
The controlling shareholder, actual controller, directors, supervisors, and senior management personnel of the company shall not utilize their related relationships to harm the interests of the company.

Those who violate the above provision and cause losses to the company shall bear compensation liability.
zh_law_content:
公司的控股股东、实际控制人、董事、监事、高级管理人员不得利用其关联关系损害公司利益。

　　违反前款规定，给公司造成损失的，应当承担赔偿责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十二条
law_content:
The resolutions of shareholders' meetings or board of directors' meetings that violate laws, administrative regulations, or articles of association are invalid.

If the convening procedures or voting methods of shareholders' meetings or board of directors' meetings violate laws, administrative regulations, or articles of association, or if the resolutions violate the articles of association, shareholders may request the people's court to revoke them within sixty days from the date of the resolutions.

When shareholders file a lawsuit according to the provisions of the preceding paragraph, the people's court may, upon the company's request, require the shareholders to provide corresponding guarantees.

If the company has already completed the registration of changes based on the resolutions of shareholders' meetings or board of directors' meetings, the company shall apply to the company registration authority to cancel the registration of changes after the people's court declares the resolutions invalid or revokes them.

Chapter II Establishment and Organizational Structure of Limited Liability Companies

Section 1 Establishment
zh_law_content:
公司股东会或者股东大会、董事会的决议内容违反法律、行政法规的无效。

　　股东会或者股东大会、董事会的会议召集程序、表决方式违反法律、行政法规或者公司章程，或者决议内容违反公司章程的，股东可以自决议作出之日起六十日内，请求人民法院撤销。

　　股东依照前款规定提起诉讼的，人民法院可以应公司的请求，要求股东提供相应担保。

　　公司根据股东会或者股东大会、董事会决议已办理变更登记的，人民法院宣告该决议无效或者撤销该决议后，公司应当向公司登记机关申请撤销变更登记。

　　第二章 有限责任公司的设立和组织机构

　　第一节 设立

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十三条
law_content:
To establish a limited liability company, the following conditions should be met:

(1) The shareholders meet the statutory minimum number.

(2) There is a subscribed capital amount by all shareholders as stipulated in the company's articles of association.

(3) The shareholders jointly develop the company's articles of association.

(4) There is a company name and an organizational structure that meets the requirements of a limited liability company.

(5) There is a registered office of the company.
zh_law_content:
设立有限责任公司，应当具备下列条 件：

　　（一）股东符合法定人数；

　　（二）有符合公司章程规定的全体股东认缴的出资额；

　　（三）股东共同制定公司章程；

　　（四）有公司名称，建立符合有限责任公司要求的组织机构；

　　（五）有公司住所。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十四条
law_content: A limited liability company is established with the contribution of less than fifty shareholders.
zh_law_content: 有限责任公司由五十个以下股东出资设立。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十五条
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司章程应当载明下列事项：

　　（一）公司名称和住所；

　　（二）公司经营范围；

　　（三）公司注册资本；

　　（四）股东的姓名或者名称；

　　（五）股东的出资方式、出资额和出资时间；

　　（六）公司的机构及其产生办法、职权、议事规则；

　　（七）公司法定代表人；

　　（八）股东会会议认为需要规定的其他事项。

　　股东应当在公司章程上签名、盖章。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十六条
law_content:
The registered capital of a limited liability company refers to the total amount of capital subscribed by all shareholders as recorded by the registration authority of the company.

If there are any other provisions regarding the actual payment of registered capital or the minimum limit of registered capital for limited liability companies in laws, administrative regulations, or decisions of the State Council, those provisions shall prevail.
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司的注册资本为在公司登记机关登记的全体股东认缴的出资额。

　　法律、行政法规以及国务院决定对有限责任公司注册资本实缴、注册资本最低限额另有规定的，从其规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十七条
law_content:
Shareholders may contribute with currency, as well as with non-monetary assets such as goods, intellectual property rights, and land use rights that can be evaluated in monetary terms and legally transferred. However, assets that are prohibited by law or administrative regulations from being used as contributions are excluded.

Non-monetary assets used as contributions should be evaluated for their value and verified. Overvaluation or undervaluation of the assets should be avoided. In cases where laws or administrative regulations provide specific requirements for the evaluation of contributions, such requirements shall be followed.
zh_law_content:
股东可以用货币出资，也可以用实物、知识产权、土地使用权等可以用货币估价并可以依法转让的非货币财产作价出资；但是，法律、行政法规规定不得作为出资的财产除外。

　　对作为出资的非货币财产应当评估作价，核实财产，不得高估或者低估作价。法律、行政法规对评估作价有规定的，从其规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十八条
law_content:
Shareholders shall pay in full and on time the capital contributions as stipulated in the company's articles of association. If a shareholder contributes capital in the form of currency, they shall deposit the full amount of the currency capital into the bank account opened by the limited liability company. If a shareholder contributes capital in the form of non-monetary assets, they shall complete the necessary procedures for the transfer of their property rights in accordance with the law.

A shareholder who fails to pay the capital contribution as stipulated in the preceding paragraph shall not only be required to fully pay the company, but also be held liable for breach of contract towards shareholders who have already paid their capital contributions in full and on time.
zh_law_content:
股东应当按期足额缴纳公司章程中规定的各自所认缴的出资额。股东以货币出资的，应当将货币出资足额存入有限责任公司在银行开设的账户；以非货币财产出资的，应当依法办理其财产权的转移手续。

　　股东不按照前款规定缴纳出资的，除应当向公司足额缴纳外，还应当向已按期足额缴纳出资的股东承担违约责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第二十九条
law_content: After the shareholders agree to the provisions of the company's articles of association regarding contributions, representatives designated by all shareholders or agents jointly authorized by them shall submit an application for registration, along with the company's articles of association and other documents, to the company registration authority for establishment registration.
zh_law_content: 股东认足公司章程规定的出资后，由全体股东指定的代表或者共同委托的代理人向公司登记机关报送公司登记申请书、公司章程等文件，申请设立登记。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十条
law_content: After the establishment of a limited liability company, if it is found that the actual value of non-monetary property contributed by shareholders for the establishment of the company is significantly lower than the value set forth in the articles of association, the shareholder who delivered such contribution shall be required to make up the difference; other shareholders at the time of the establishment of the company shall bear joint liabilities.
zh_law_content: 有限责任公司成立后，发现作为设立公司出资的非货币财产的实际价额显著低于公司章程所定价额的，应当由交付该出资的股东补足其差额；公司设立时的其他股东承担连带责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十一条
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司成立后，应当向股东签发出资证明书。

　　出资证明书应当载明下列事项：

　　（一）公司名称；

　　（二）公司成立日期；

　　（三）公司注册资本；

　　（四）股东的姓名或者名称、缴纳的出资额和出资日期；

　　（五）出资证明书的编号和核发日期。

　　出资证明书由公司盖章。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十二条
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司应当置备股东名册，记载下列事项：

　　（一）股东的姓名或者名称及住所；

　　（二）股东的出资额；

　　（三）出资证明书编号。

　　记载于股东名册的股东，可以依股东名册主张行使股东权利。

　　公司应当将股东的姓名或者名称向公司登记机关登记；登记事项发生变更的，应当办理变更登记。未经登记或者变更登记的，不得对抗第三人。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十三条
law_content:
Shareholders have the right to access and make copies of the company's articles of association, minutes of shareholder meetings, resolutions of the board of directors, resolutions of the supervisory board, and financial accounting reports.

Shareholders can request access to the company's accounting books. If a shareholder requests access to the company's accounting books, they should submit a written request to the company, stating the purpose. If the company has reasonable grounds to believe that the shareholder's access to the accounting books is for improper purposes and may harm the company's legitimate interests, it may refuse to provide access and must respond to the shareholder's written request within fifteen days, providing reasons for the refusal. If the company refuses to provide access, the shareholder may request the court to order the company to provide access.
zh_law_content:
股东有权查阅、复制公司章程、股东会会议记录、董事会会议决议、监事会会议决议和财务会计报告。

　　股东可以要求查阅公司会计账簿。股东要求查阅公司会计账簿的，应当向公司提出书面请求，说明目的。公司有合理根据认为股东查阅会计账簿有不正当目的，可能损害公司合法利益的，可以拒绝提供查阅，并应当自股东提出书面请求之日起十五日内书面答复股东并说明理由。公司拒绝提供查阅的，股东可以请求人民法院要求公司提供查阅。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十四条
law_content: Shareholders are entitled to receive dividends in proportion to their paid-in contributions; when the company increases its capital, shareholders have the right to preferentially subscribe for new capital in proportion to their paid-in contributions. However, this does not apply when all shareholders agree to not distribute dividends in proportion to their contributions or not to prioritize subscription of new capital in proportion to their contributions.
zh_law_content: 股东按照实缴的出资比例分取红利；公司新增资本时，股东有权优先按照实缴的出资比例认缴出资。但是，全体股东约定不按照出资比例分取红利或者不按照出资比例优先认缴出资的除外。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十五条
law_content:
After the establishment of the company, shareholders shall not withdraw capital. 

Section 2 Organizational Structure
zh_law_content:
公司成立后，股东不得抽逃出资。

　　第二节 组织机构

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十六条
law_content: General Assembly of Shareholders is composed of all shareholders of a limited liability company. The Shareholders' Assembly is the governing body of the company and exercises its powers in accordance with this law.
zh_law_content: 有限责任公司股东会由全体股东组成。股东会是公司的权力机构，依照本法行使职权。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十七条
zh_law_content:
股东会行使下列职权：

　　（一）决定公司的经营方针和投资计划；

　　（二）选举和更换非由职工代表担任的董事、监事，决定有关董事、监事的报酬事项；

　　（三）审议批准董事会的报告；

　　（四）审议批准监事会或者监事的报告；

　　（五）审议批准公司的年度财务预算方案、决算方案；

　　（六）审议批准公司的利润分配方案和弥补亏损方案；

　　（七）对公司增加或者减少注册资本作出决议；

　　（八）对发行公司债券作出决议；

　　（九）对公司合并、分立、解散、清算或者变更公司形式作出决议；

　　（十）修改公司章程；

　　（十一）公司章程规定的其他职权。

　　对前款所列事项股东以书面形式一致表示同意的，可以不召开股东会会议，直接作出决定，并由全体股东在决定文件上签名、盖章。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十八条
law_content: The first shareholders' meeting shall be convened and chaired by the shareholder with the highest contribution and exercise its powers in accordance with the provisions of this Law.
zh_law_content: 首次股东会会议由出资最多的股东召集和主持，依照本法规定行使职权。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第三十九条
law_content:
Shareholders' meetings are divided into regular meetings and extraordinary meetings.

Regular meetings should be held on time in accordance with the provisions of the company's articles of association. If shareholders representing more than one-tenth of the voting rights, more than one-third of the directors, or the supervisors of a company without a supervisory board propose to convene an extraordinary meeting, an extraordinary meeting should be convened.
zh_law_content:
股东会会议分为定期会议和临时会议。

　　定期会议应当依照公司章程的规定按时召开。代表十分之一以上表决权的股东，三分之一以上的董事，监事会或者不设监事会的公司的监事提议召开临时会议的，应当召开临时会议。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十条
law_content:
Board of directors of a limited liability company shall be convened by the board of directors, and the chairman of the board shall preside over the shareholders' meeting; if the chairman of the board cannot perform his duties or fails to perform his duties, the vice chairman shall preside over; if the vice chairman cannot perform his duties or fails to perform his duties, a director shall be elected by a majority of the directors to preside over the meeting.

If a limited liability company does not have a board of directors, the shareholders' meeting shall be convened and presided over by the executive director.

If the board of directors or executive directors fail to perform or fail to convene the shareholders' meeting, the supervisory board or the supervisors of a company without a supervisory board shall convene and preside over; if the supervisory board or supervisors fail to convene and preside over, shareholders representing more than one tenth of the voting rights can convene and preside over the meeting.
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司设立董事会的，股东会会议由董事会召集，董事长主持；董事长不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由副董事长主持；副董事长不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由半数以上董事共同推举一名董事主持。

　　有限责任公司不设董事会的，股东会会议由执行董事召集和主持。

　　董事会或者执行董事不能履行或者不履行召集股东会会议职责的，由监事会或者不设监事会的公司的监事召集和主持；监事会或者监事不召集和主持的，代表十分之一以上表决权的股东可以自行召集和主持。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十一条
law_content:
A shareholder meeting shall be convened by providing notice to all shareholders at least fifteen days prior to the meeting, except in cases where the company's articles of incorporation specify otherwise or all shareholders have made a separate agreement.

The decisions regarding the matters discussed at the shareholder meeting shall be documented in the meeting minutes, and the attending shareholders shall sign the meeting minutes.
zh_law_content:
召开股东会会议，应当于会议召开十五日前通知全体股东；但是，公司章程另有规定或者全体股东另有约定的除外。

　　股东会应当对所议事项的决定作成会议记录，出席会议的股东应当在会议记录上签名。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十二条
law_content: Shareholders' meeting is conducted by shareholders exercising their voting rights in accordance with their capital contribution proportions, unless otherwise specified in the company's articles of association.
zh_law_content: 股东会会议由股东按照出资比例行使表决权；但是，公司章程另有规定的除外。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十三条
law_content:
The manner of conducting shareholders' meetings and the voting procedures shall be determined by the company's bylaws, except as otherwise provided by this law.

Resolutions of the shareholders' meeting to amend the company's bylaws, increase or decrease registered capital, as well as resolutions on the merger, division, dissolution, or change of corporate form of the company, must be passed by shareholders representing more than two-thirds of the voting rights.
zh_law_content:
股东会的议事方式和表决程序，除本法有规定的外，由公司章程规定。

　　股东会会议作出修改公司章程、增加或者减少注册资本的决议，以及公司合并、分立、解散或者变更公司形式的决议，必须经代表三分之二以上表决权的股东通过。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十四条
law_content:
A limited liability company shall establish a board of directors, consisting of three to thirteen members, unless otherwise provided in Article 50 of this Law.

In a limited liability company invested by two or more state-owned enterprises or other state-owned investment entities, there shall be employee representatives in the board of directors; in other limited liability companies, there may be employee representatives in the board of directors. The employee representatives in the board of directors shall be elected by the company employees through a workers' representative assembly, workers' assembly, or other forms of democratic election.

The board of directors shall have one chairman and may have one or more vice-chairmen. The method of appointing the chairman and vice-chairmen shall be specified in the company's articles of association.
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司设董事会，其成员为三人至十三人；但是，本法第五十条 另有规定的除外。

　　两个以上的国有企业或者两个以上的其他国有投资主体投资设立的有限责任公司，其董事会成员中应当有公司职工代表；其他有限责任公司董事会成员中可以有公司职工代表。董事会中的职工代表由公司职工通过职工代表大会、职工大会或者其他形式民主选举产生。

　　董事会设董事长一人，可以设副董事长。董事长、副董事长的产生办法由公司章程规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十五条
law_content:
The term of office of directors is stipulated by the company's articles of association, but each term shall not exceed three years. Directors can be re-elected upon the expiration of their term. 

If the term of office of a director expires and a timely election is not conducted, or if a director resigns during his term, resulting in the number of members of the board of directors falling below the statutory requirement, the outgoing directors shall continue to perform their duties in accordance with the provisions of laws, administrative regulations, and the company's articles of association until the newly elected directors assume office.
zh_law_content:
董事任期由公司章程规定，但每届任期不得超过三年。董事任期届满，连选可以连任。

　　董事任期届满未及时改选，或者董事在任期内辞职导致董事会成员低于法定人数的，在改选出的董事就任前，原董事仍应当依照法律、行政法规和公司章程的规定，履行董事职务。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十六条
zh_law_content:
董事会对股东会负责，行使下列职权：

　　（一）召集股东会会议，并向股东会报告工作；

　　（二）执行股东会的决议；

　　（三）决定公司的经营计划和投资方案；

　　（四）制订公司的年度财务预算方案、决算方案；

　　（五）制订公司的利润分配方案和弥补亏损方案；

　　（六）制订公司增加或者减少注册资本以及发行公司债券的方案；

　　（七）制订公司合并、分立、解散或者变更公司形式的方案；

　　（八）决定公司内部管理机构的设置；

　　（九）决定聘任或者解聘公司经理及其报酬事项，并根据经理的提名决定聘任或者解聘公司副经理、财务负责人及其报酬事项；

　　（十）制定公司的基本管理制度；

　　（十一）公司章程规定的其他职权。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十七条
law_content: The board meeting is convened and chaired by the chairman of the board; if the chairman is unable or fails to perform their duties, the vice chairman shall convene and preside over the meeting; if the vice chairman is unable or fails to perform their duties, a director shall be elected by a majority of the board to convene and preside over the meeting.
zh_law_content: 董事会会议由董事长召集和主持；董事长不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由副董事长召集和主持；副董事长不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由半数以上董事共同推举一名董事召集和主持。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十八条
law_content:
The rules and procedures for board meetings and voting, unless otherwise specified in this Law, shall be determined by the company's articles of association.

The board of directors shall make minutes of the decisions made on the matters discussed, and attending directors shall sign on the minutes.

Voting on board resolutions shall be conducted on a one vote per director basis.
zh_law_content:
董事会的议事方式和表决程序，除本法有规定的外，由公司章程规定。

　　董事会应当对所议事项的决定作成会议记录，出席会议的董事应当在会议记录上签名。

　　董事会决议的表决，实行一人一票。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第四十九条
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司可以设经理，由董事会决定聘任或者解聘。经理对董事会负责，行使下列职权：

　　（一）主持公司的生产经营管理工作，组织实施董事会决议；

　　（二）组织实施公司年度经营计划和投资方案；

　　（三）拟订公司内部管理机构设置方案；

　　（四）拟订公司的基本管理制度；

　　（五）制定公司的具体规章；

　　（六）提请聘任或者解聘公司副经理、财务负责人；

　　（七）决定聘任或者解聘除应由董事会决定聘任或者解聘以外的负责管理人员；

　　（八）董事会授予的其他职权。

　　公司章程对经理职权另有规定的，从其规定。

　　经理列席董事会会议。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十条
law_content:
Limited liability companies with fewer shareholders or smaller scales can have one executive director without establishing a board of directors. The executive director can also serve as the company manager.

The powers and responsibilities of the executive director are specified in the company's articles of association.
zh_law_content:
股东人数较少或者规模较小的有限责任公司，可以设一名执行董事，不设董事会。执行董事可以兼任公司经理。

　　执行董事的职权由公司章程规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十一条
law_content:
The limited liability company shall establish a supervisory board, with a minimum of three members. For limited liability companies with fewer shareholders or smaller scale, one to two supervisors may be appointed, without establishing a supervisory board.

The supervisory board shall include representatives of shareholders and an appropriate proportion of employee representatives, with the proportion of employee representatives not less than one-third, as specified in the company's articles of association. The employee representatives on the supervisory board shall be elected by the company's employees through a representative assembly, employee assembly, or other forms of democratic election.

The supervisory board shall have a chairman, elected by a majority vote of the supervisors. The chairman of the supervisory board shall convene and preside over the meetings of the supervisory board. If the chairman is unable to perform his duties or fails to do so, a supervisor shall be elected by a majority of the supervisors to convene and preside over the meetings of the supervisory board.

Directors and senior management personnel shall not concurrently serve as supervisors.
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司设监事会，其成员不得少于三人。股东人数较少或者规模较小的有限责任公司，可以设一至二名监事，不设监事会。

　　监事会应当包括股东代表和适当比例的公司职工代表，其中职工代表的比例不得低于三分之一，具体比例由公司章程规定。监事会中的职工代表由公司职工通过职工代表大会、职工大会或者其他形式民主选举产生。

　　监事会设主席一人，由全体监事过半数选举产生。监事会主席召集和主持监事会会议；监事会主席不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由半数以上监事共同推举一名监事召集和主持监事会会议。

　　董事、高级管理人员不得兼任监事。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十二条
law_content:
The term of office for supervisors is three years. Supervisors can be re-elected for consecutive terms.

If the term of office for supervisors expires and a timely reelection is not conducted, or if a supervisor resigns during their term and results in the number of supervisors falling below the statutory requirement, the outgoing supervisor shall still fulfill their duties in accordance with the provisions of laws, administrative regulations, and the company's articles of association until the newly elected supervisors assume their positions.
zh_law_content:
监事的任期每届为三年。监事任期届满，连选可以连任。

　　监事任期届满未及时改选，或者监事在任期内辞职导致监事会成员低于法定人数的，在改选出的监事就任前，原监事仍应当依照法律、行政法规和公司章程的规定，履行监事职务。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十三条
zh_law_content:
监事会、不设监事会的公司的监事行使下列职权：

　　（一）检查公司财务；

　　（二）对董事、高级管理人员执行公司职务的行为进行监督，对违反法律、行政法规、公司章程或者股东会决议的董事、高级管理人员提出罢免的建议；

　　（三）当董事、高级管理人员的行为损害公司的利益时，要求董事、高级管理人员予以纠正；

　　（四）提议召开临时股东会会议，在董事会不履行本法规定的召集和主持股东会会议职责时召集和主持股东会会议；

　　（五）向股东会会议提出提案；

　　（六）依照本法第一百五十一条 的规定，对董事、高级管理人员提起诉讼；

　　（七）公司章程规定的其他职权。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十四条
law_content:
Supervisors may attend board meetings and raise inquiries or suggestions regarding board resolutions. 

In the case of companies with a supervisory board or without a supervisory board, supervisors can investigate if they find anomalous business operations within the company. When necessary, they can engage the services of accounting firms or other relevant entities to assist in their work, with the expenses borne by the company.
zh_law_content:
监事可以列席董事会会议，并对董事会决议事项提出质询或者建议。

　　监事会、不设监事会的公司的监事发现公司经营情况异常，可以进行调查；必要时，可以聘请会计师事务所等协助其工作，费用由公司承担。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十五条
law_content:
The board of supervisors shall hold at least one meeting per fiscal year, and supervisors have the right to propose the convening of an ad hoc meeting.

The board of supervisors' meeting procedures and voting processes shall be stipulated in the company's articles of association, except as otherwise provided in this Law.

A resolution of the board of supervisors shall be approved by more than half of the supervisors.

The board of supervisors shall make meeting minutes for the decisions on matters discussed, and attending supervisors shall sign the meeting minutes.
zh_law_content:
监事会每年度至少召开一次会议，监事可以提议召开临时监事会会议。

　　监事会的议事方式和表决程序，除本法有规定的外，由公司章 程规定。

　　监事会决议应当经半数以上监事通过。

　　监事会应当对所议事项的决定作成会议记录，出席会议的监事应当在会议记录上签名。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十六条
law_content:
The expenses necessary for the exercise of the supervisory authority of the supervisory board or the absence of a supervisory board shall be borne by the company.

Section 3 Special Provisions for One-Person Limited Liability Companies
zh_law_content:
监事会、不设监事会的公司的监事行使职权所必需的费用，由公司承担。

　　第三节一人有限责任公司的特别规定

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十七条
law_content:
The establishment and organizational structure of a single-member limited liability company shall be subject to the provisions of this section; in the absence of such provisions, the provisions of the first and second sections of this chapter shall apply.

A single-member limited liability company, as referred to in this law, refers to a limited liability company with only one natural person shareholder or one legal person shareholder.
zh_law_content:
一人有限责任公司的设立和组织机构，适用本节规定；本节没有规定的，适用本章第一节、第二节的规定。

　　本法所称一人有限责任公司，是指只有一个自然人股东或者一个法人股东的有限责任公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十八条
law_content: A natural person can only establish one single-member limited liability company. This single-member limited liability company cannot invest in establishing another single-member limited liability company.
zh_law_content: 一个自然人只能投资设立一个一人有限责任公司。该一人有限责任公司不能投资设立新的一人有限责任公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第五十九条
law_content: A sole proprietorship by a natural person or a legal person shall be indicated in the company registration and stated on the business license of the company.
zh_law_content: 一人有限责任公司应当在公司登记中注明自然人独资或者法人独资，并在公司营业执照中载明。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十条
law_content: The articles of association of a single-member limited liability company are formulated by the shareholder.
zh_law_content: 一人有限责任公司章程由股东制定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十一条
law_content: A single-member limited liability company does not have a shareholders' meeting. When a shareholder makes a decision as listed in Article 37, paragraph 1 of this Law, it shall be in written form and signed by the shareholder before being kept by the company.
zh_law_content: 一人有限责任公司不设股东会。股东作出本法第三十七条 第一款所列决定时，应当采用书面形式，并由股东签名后置备于公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十二条
law_content: A sole proprietorship limited liability company shall prepare financial accounting reports at the end of each fiscal year and have them audited by an accounting firm.
zh_law_content: 一人有限责任公司应当在每一会计年度终了时编制财务会计报告，并经会计师事务所审计。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十三条
law_content:
A shareholder of a sole proprietorship limited liability company cannot prove that the company's assets are separate from their own assets and shall bear joint liability for the company's debts.

Section 4 Special Provisions for State-owned Sole Proprietorship Companies.
zh_law_content:
一人有限责任公司的股东不能证明公司财产独立于股东自己的财产的，应当对公司债务承担连带责任。

　　第四节 国有独资公司的特别规定

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十四条
law_content:
The establishment and organizational structure of wholly state-owned enterprises shall be subject to the provisions of this section; if not provided in this section, the provisions of the first and second sections of this chapter shall apply.

A wholly state-owned enterprise referred to in this Law means a limited liability company in which the state provides sole investment and the government at the corresponding level authorizes the state-owned assets supervision and administration institution of the government at the corresponding level to fulfill the duties of the investor.
zh_law_content:
国有独资公司的设立和组织机构，适用本节规定；本节没有规定的，适用本章第一节、第二节的规定。

　　本法所称国有独资公司，是指国家单独出资、由国务院或者地方人民政府授权本级人民政府国有资产监督管理机构履行出资人职责的有限责任公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十五条
law_content: The articles of association of state-owned sole proprietorship companies shall be formulated by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority, or by the board of directors and submitted for approval by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority.
zh_law_content: 国有独资公司章程由国有资产监督管理机构制定，或者由董事会制订报国有资产监督管理机构批准。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十六条
law_content:
State-owned sole proprietorship companies do not have shareholders' meetings and the shareholder functions are carried out by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority. The authority can authorize the board of directors of the company to exercise certain shareholder functions and make decisions on major matters of the company. However, the merger, separation, dissolution, increase or decrease of registered capital, and issuance of corporate bonds must be decided by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority. For important state-owned sole proprietorship companies, the merger, separation, dissolution, and bankruptcy application should be reviewed by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority and approved by the local people's government.

The determination of important state-owned sole proprietorship companies mentioned in the preceding paragraph shall be made in accordance with the regulations of the State Council.
zh_law_content:
国有独资公司不设股东会，由国有资产监督管理机构行使股东会职权。国有资产监督管理机构可以授权公司董事会行使股东会的部分职权，决定公司的重大事项，但公司的合并、分立、解散、增加或者减少注册资本和发行公司债券，必须由国有资产监督管理机构决定；其中，重要的国有独资公司合并、分立、解散、申请破产的，应当由国有资产监督管理机构审核后，报本级人民政府批准。

　　前款所称重要的国有独资公司，按照国务院的规定确定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十七条
law_content:
A state-owned sole proprietorship company shall establish a board of directors, and exercise its powers in accordance with Article 46 and Article 66 of this Law. The term of office for each director shall not exceed three years. The board of directors shall include representatives of the company's employees.

Members of the board of directors shall be appointed by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority; however, employee representatives among the board members shall be elected by the company's employee representative assembly.

The board of directors shall appoint one chairman and may also appoint vice chairmen. The chairman and vice chairmen shall be designated by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority from among the members of the board of directors.
zh_law_content:
国有独资公司设董事会，依照本法第四十六条 、第六十六条 的规定行使职权。董事每届任期不得超过三年。董事会成员中应当有公司职工代表。

　　董事会成员由国有资产监督管理机构委派；但是，董事会成员中的职工代表由公司职工代表大会选举产生。

　　董事会设董事长一人，可以设副董事长。董事长、副董事长由国有资产监督管理机构从董事会成员中指定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十八条
law_content:
The state-owned sole proprietorship company shall appoint or dismiss a manager through the board of directors, as stipulated in Article 49 of this law.

With the approval of the state-owned assets supervision and administration institution, members of the board of directors may concurrently serve as managers.
zh_law_content:
国有独资公司设经理，由董事会聘任或者解聘。经理依照本法第四十九条 规定行使职权。

　　经国有资产监督管理机构同意，董事会成员可以兼任经理。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第六十九条
law_content: The chairman, vice chairman, directors, and senior management of state-owned sole proprietorship companies shall not hold concurrent positions in other limited liability companies, joint-stock companies, or other economic organizations without the consent of the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority.
zh_law_content: 国有独资公司的董事长、副董事长、董事、高级管理人员，未经国有资产监督管理机构同意，不得在其他有限责任公司、股份有限公司或者其他经济组织兼职。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十条
law_content:
The number of members in the board of supervisors of a state-owned sole proprietorship company shall not be less than five, and the proportion of employee representatives shall not be less than one-third, as specified in the company's articles of association.

The members of the board of supervisors are appointed by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority; however, the employee representatives among the members of the board of supervisors are elected by the company's employee representative assembly. The chairman of the board of supervisors is appointed by the state-owned assets supervision and administration authority from among the members of the board of supervisors.

The board of supervisors exercises the powers stipulated in Article 53, paragraph (1) to paragraph (3) of this Law and other powers stipulated by the State Council.

Chapter III Transfer of Equity in Limited Liability Companies
zh_law_content:
国有独资公司监事会成员不得少于五人，其中职工代表的比例不得低于三分之一，具体比例由公司章程规定。

　　监事会成员由国有资产监督管理机构委派；但是，监事会成员中的职工代表由公司职工代表大会选举产生。监事会主席由国有资产监督管理机构从监事会成员中指定。

　　监事会行使本法第五十三条 第（一）项至第（三）项规定的职权和国务院规定的其他职权。

　　第三章 有限责任公司的股权转让

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十一条
law_content:
Shareholders of a limited liability company can transfer their entire or partial equity to each other.

If a shareholder transfers their equity to someone other than a shareholder, it must be approved by a majority of the other shareholders. The transferring shareholder should notify the other shareholders in writing and seek their approval. If the other shareholders do not reply within thirty days of receiving the written notice, it will be considered as approving the transfer. If more than half of the other shareholders do not approve the transfer, the dissenting shareholders should purchase the transferred equity. If they do not purchase it, it will be considered as approving the transfer.

If the transfer of equity is approved by the shareholders, the other shareholders have the right of first refusal under the same terms and conditions. If more than two shareholders want to exercise their right of first refusal, they should negotiate and determine their respective proportion of purchase. If they cannot reach an agreement through negotiation, the right of first refusal should be exercised based on their respective contribution ratio at the time of transfer.

If the articles of association of the company have separate provisions regarding the transfer of equity, those provisions shall prevail.
zh_law_content:
有限责任公司的股东之间可以相互转让其全部或者部分股权。

　　股东向股东以外的人转让股权，应当经其他股东过半数同意。股东应就其股权转让事项书面通知其他股东征求同意，其他股东自接到书面通知之日起满三十日未答复的，视为同意转让。其他股东半数以上不同意转让的，不同意的股东应当购买该转让的股权；不购买的，视为同意转让。

　　经股东同意转让的股权，在同等条 件下，其他股东有优先购买权。两个以上股东主张行使优先购买权的，协商确定各自的购买比例；协商不成的，按照转让时各自的出资比例行使优先购买权。

　　公司章程对股权转让另有规定的，从其规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十二条
law_content: When a people's court transfers the shareholder's equity in accordance with the compulsory enforcement procedure stipulated by law, it shall notify the company and all shareholders, and other shareholders have the right of priority purchase under the same conditions. If other shareholders fail to exercise the right of priority purchase within twenty days from the date of notification by the people's court, it shall be deemed as waiving the right of priority purchase.
zh_law_content: 人民法院依照法律规定的强制执行程序转让股东的股权时，应当通知公司及全体股东，其他股东在同等条 件下有优先购买权。其他股东自人民法院通知之日起满二十日不行使优先购买权的，视为放弃优先购买权。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十三条
law_content: According to Article 71 and Article 72 of this law, after transferring equity, the company shall cancel the original shareholder's investment certificate, issue a new investment certificate to the new shareholder, and make corresponding modifications to the company's articles of association and shareholder register regarding the record of shareholders and their contributions. The modification to the company's articles of association does not require further voting by the shareholders' meeting.
zh_law_content: 依照本法第七十一条 、第七十二条 转让股权后，公司应当注销原股东的出资证明书，向新股东签发出资证明书，并相应修改公司章程和股东名册中有关股东及其出资额的记载。对公司章程的该项修改不需再由股东会表决。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十四条
zh_law_content:
有下列情形之一的，对股东会该项决议投反对票的股东可以请求公司按照合理的价格收购其股权：

　　（一）公司连续五年不向股东分配利润，而公司该五年连续盈利，并且符合本法规定的分配利润条 件的；

　　（二）公司合并、分立、转让主要财产的；

　　（三）公司章程规定的营业期限届满或者章程规定的其他解散事由出现，股东会会议通过决议修改章程使公司存续的。

　　自股东会会议决议通过之日起六十日内，股东与公司不能达成股权收购协议的，股东可以自股东会会议决议通过之日起九十日内向人民法院提起诉讼。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十五条
law_content:
After the death of a natural person shareholder, their legal heirs can inherit the shareholder qualification, unless otherwise provided in the company's articles of association.

Chapter 4 Establishment and Organizational Structure of a Limited Liability Company

Section 1 Establishment
zh_law_content:
自然人股东死亡后，其合法继承人可以继承股东资格；但是，公司章程另有规定的除外。

　　第四章 股份有限公司的设立和组织机构

　　第一节 设立

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十六条
law_content:
To establish a joint stock limited company, the following conditions must be met:

(1) The initiators meet the statutory number of individuals required.

(2) The total amount of subscribed capital or the total amount of paid-up capital raised meets the requirements specified in the company's articles of association.

(3) The issuance of shares and the preparation of matters comply with the provisions of the law.

(4) The initiators formulate the company's articles of association, which are approved by the establishment general meeting when established through fundraising.

(5) The company has a name and establishes an organizational structure that meets the requirements of a joint stock limited company.

(6) The company has a registered address.
zh_law_content:
设立股份有限公司，应当具备下列条 件：

　　（一）发起人符合法定人数；

　　（二）有符合公司章程规定的全体发起人认购的股本总额或者募集的实收股本总额；

　　（三）股份发行、筹办事项符合法律规定；

　　（四）发起人制订公司章程，采用募集方式设立的经创立大会通过；

　　（五）有公司名称，建立符合股份有限公司要求的组织机构；

　　（六）有公司住所。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十七条
law_content:
The establishment of a limited liability company can be done through either a sponsored establishment or a fundraising establishment.

Sponsored establishment refers to the establishment of a company by the subscribers who subscribe to all the shares that the company plans to issue.

Fundraising establishment refers to the establishment of a company by the subscribers who subscribe to a portion of the shares that the company plans to issue, while the remaining shares are publicly or privately solicited from the general public or specific individuals.
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司的设立，可以采取发起设立或者募集设立的方式。

　　发起设立，是指由发起人认购公司应发行的全部股份而设立公司。

　　募集设立，是指由发起人认购公司应发行股份的一部分，其余股份向社会公开募集或者向特定对象募集而设立公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十八条
law_content: To establish a limited liability company, there must be two or more but no more than two hundred initiators, with more than half of the initiators having a residence in China.
zh_law_content: 设立股份有限公司，应当有二人以上二百人以下为发起人，其中须有半数以上的发起人在中国境内有住所。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第七十九条
law_content:
The initiators of a limited liability company bear the responsibilities for the company's preparatory matters.

The initiators should sign a initiators agreement to clarify their respective rights and obligations during the establishment process of the company.
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司发起人承担公司筹办事务。

　　发起人应当签订发起人协议，明确各自在公司设立过程中的权利和义务。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十条
law_content:
A limited liability company established through the method of initiation shall have a registered capital equal to the total subscribed capital by all initiators as recorded by the company registration authority. No shares can be raised from others before the subscribed shares by initiators are fully paid.

A limited liability company established through the method of public offering shall have a registered capital equal to the total paid-in capital as recorded by the company registration authority.

If there are other provisions regarding the actual payment of registered capital or the minimum amount of registered capital in laws, administrative regulations, or State Council decisions, those provisions shall apply.
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司采取发起设立方式设立的，注册资本为在公司登记机关登记的全体发起人认购的股本总额。在发起人认购的股份缴足前，不得向他人募集股份。

　　股份有限公司采取募集方式设立的，注册资本为在公司登记机关登记的实收股本总额。

　　法律、行政法规以及国务院决定对股份有限公司注册资本实缴、注册资本最低限额另有规定的，从其规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十一条
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司章程应当载明下列事项：

　　（一）公司名称和住所；

　　（二）公司经营范围；

　　（三）公司设立方式；

　　（四）公司股份总数、每股金额和注册资本；

　　（五）发起人的姓名或者名称、认购的股份数、出资方式和出资时间；

　　（六）董事会的组成、职权和议事规则；

　　（七）公司法定代表人；

　　（八）监事会的组成、职权和议事规则；

　　（九）公司利润分配办法；

　　（十）公司的解散事由与清算办法；

　　（十一）公司的通知和公告办法；

　　（十二）股东大会会议认为需要规定的其他事项。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十二条
law_content: The contributor's method of contribution shall comply with the provisions of Article 27 of this Law.
zh_law_content: 发起人的出资方式，适用本法第二十七条 的规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十三条
law_content:
If a joint-stock limited company is established through the method of establishment by the initiators, the initiators shall submit written confirmation of their subscribed shares as stipulated in the company's articles of association, and shall make capital contributions as specified in the company's articles of association. If non-monetary assets are contributed, the transfer procedures for the property rights shall be completed in accordance with the law.

If the initiators fail to make capital contributions in accordance with the provisions mentioned above, they shall assume the liability for breach of contract as stipulated in the initiators' agreement.

After the initiators have fulfilled the capital contributions specified in the company's articles of association, the board of directors and the supervisory board shall be elected. The board of directors shall submit the company's articles of association, as well as other documents required by laws and administrative regulations, to the company registration authority to apply for registration.
zh_law_content:
以发起设立方式设立股份有限公司的，发起人应当书面认足公司章程规定其认购的股份，并按照公司章程规定缴纳出资。以非货币财产出资的，应当依法办理其财产权的转移手续。

　　发起人不依照前款规定缴纳出资的，应当按照发起人协议承担违约责任。

　　发起人认足公司章程规定的出资后，应当选举董事会和监事会，由董事会向公司登记机关报送公司章程以及法律、行政法规规定的其他文件，申请设立登记。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十四条
law_content: If a joint stock limited company is established through the method of soliciting establishment, the subscribers must not subscribe for less than thirty-five percent of the total shares of the company; however, if otherwise stipulated by laws and administrative regulations, such stipulations shall prevail.
zh_law_content: 以募集设立方式设立股份有限公司的，发起人认购的股份不得少于公司股份总数的百分之三十五；但是，法律、行政法规另有规定的，从其规定。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十五条
law_content: The initiator shall publicly solicit shares from the society, and must issue a prospectus and prepare a subscription form. The subscription form shall include the matters specified in Article 86 of this Law, to be completed by the subscriber with the number of shares subscribed, amount, residential address, and signature and seal. The subscriber shall pay the share capital according to the subscribed number of shares.
zh_law_content: 发起人向社会公开募集股份，必须公告招股说明书，并制作认股书。认股书应当载明本法第八十六条 所列事项，由认股人填写认购股数、金额、住所，并签名、盖章。认股人按照所认购股数缴纳股款。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十六条
zh_law_content:
招股说明书应当附有发起人制订的公司章程，并载明下列事项：

　　（一）发起人认购的股份数；

　　（二）每股的票面金额和发行价格；

　　（三）无记名股票的发行总数；

　　（四）募集资金的用途；

　　（五）认股人的权利、义务；

　　（六）本次募股的起止期限及逾期未募足时认股人可以撤回所认股份的说明。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十七条
law_content: The initiator shall engage a legally established securities firm to underwrite and sign an underwriting agreement for the public offering of shares to the society.
zh_law_content: 发起人向社会公开募集股份，应当由依法设立的证券公司承销，签订承销协议。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十八条
law_content:
The initiator should sign a stock collection agreement with a bank when publicly soliciting shares from the general public.

The bank receiving the stock collection should collect and hold the payment according to the agreement, issue payment receipts to subscribing shareholders, and have the obligation to provide payment certificates to relevant authorities.
zh_law_content:
发起人向社会公开募集股份，应当同银行签订代收股款协议。

　　代收股款的银行应当按照协议代收和保存股款，向缴纳股款的认股人出具收款单据，并负有向有关部门出具收款证明的义务。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第八十九条
law_content:
After the payment of the subscribed shares is fully made, it must be verified by a capital verification institution established in accordance with the law, and a certificate shall be issued. The initiators shall convene the company establishment meeting within thirty days from the date of full payment of the shares. The establishment meeting shall be composed of the initiators and subscribers.

If the subscribed shares have not been fully raised within the deadline specified in the prospectus, or if the initiators fail to convene the establishment meeting within thirty days after the full payment of the shares, the subscribers have the right to demand the initiators to refund the amount paid for the shares plus the interest calculated based on the interest rate of the bank's time deposits.
zh_law_content:
发行股份的股款缴足后，必须经依法设立的验资机构验资并出具证明。发起人应当自股款缴足之日起三十日内主持召开公司创立大会。创立大会由发起人、认股人组成。

　　发行的股份超过招股说明书规定的截止期限尚未募足的，或者发行股份的股款缴足后，发起人在三十日内未召开创立大会的，认股人可以按照所缴股款并加算银行同期存款利息，要求发起人返还。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十条
law_content:
The initiator should notify each shareholder or make an announcement regarding the meeting date at least fifteen days prior to the establishment conference. The establishment conference can only be held if the majority of shares, represented by the initiator and shareholders, are present.

The establishment conference shall exercise the following powers:

1. Review the report by the initiator on the company's preparatory situation.
2. Approve the articles of association.
3. Elect members of the board of directors.
4. Elect members of the supervisory board.
5. Review the establishment expenses of the company.
6. Review the valuation of the property used by the initiator as capital contributions.
7. In the event of force majeure or significant changes in operating conditions that directly affect the establishment of the company, a resolution may be made to not establish the company.

Resolutions on the matters listed in the preceding paragraph must be passed by a majority of voting rights held by the shareholders present at the meeting.
zh_law_content:
发起人应当在创立大会召开十五日前将会议日期通知各认股人或者予以公告。创立大会应有代表股份总数过半数的发起人、认股人出席，方可举行。

　　创立大会行使下列职权：

　　（一）审议发起人关于公司筹办情况的报告；

　　（二）通过公司章程；

　　（三）选举董事会成员；

　　（四）选举监事会成员；

　　（五）对公司的设立费用进行审核；

　　（六）对发起人用于抵作股款的财产的作价进行审核；

　　（七）发生不可抗力或者经营条 件发生重大变化直接影响公司设立的，可以作出不设立公司的决议。

　　创立大会对前款所列事项作出决议，必须经出席会议的认股人所持表决权过半数通过。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十一条
law_content: The initiator or subscriber shall not withdraw their capital contribution or the pledged share capital after payment or delivery, except in the case of failure to fully raise the shares on schedule, the initiator's failure to convene the founding meeting on schedule, or the resolution of the founding meeting to not establish the company.
zh_law_content: 发起人、认股人缴纳股款或者交付抵作股款的出资后，除未按期募足股份、发起人未按期召开创立大会或者创立大会决议不设立公司的情形外，不得抽回其股本。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十二条
zh_law_content:
董事会应于创立大会结束后三十日内，向公司登记机关报送下列文件，申请设立登记：

　　（一）公司登记申请书；

　　（二）创立大会的会议记录；

　　（三）公司章程；

　　（四）验资证明；

　　（五）法定代表人、董事、监事的任职文件及其身份证明；

　　（六）发起人的法人资格证明或者自然人身份证明；

　　（七）公司住所证明。

　　以募集方式设立股份有限公司公开发行股票的，还应当向公司登记机关报送国务院证券监督管理机构的核准文件。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十三条
law_content:
After the establishment of a limited liability company, if the promoters fail to make full payment of the subscribed capital as stipulated in the company's articles of association, they shall be required to make up for the shortfall. Other promoters shall bear joint and several liability.

If, after the establishment of a limited liability company, it is discovered that the actual value of non-monetary assets contributed to the company is significantly lower than the price stipulated in the articles of association, the promoter who made the contribution shall be responsible for making up the difference. Other promoters shall bear joint and several liability.
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司成立后，发起人未按照公司章程的规定缴足出资的，应当补缴；其他发起人承担连带责任。

　　股份有限公司成立后，发现作为设立公司出资的非货币财产的实际价额显著低于公司章程所定价额的，应当由交付该出资的发起人补足其差额；其他发起人承担连带责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十四条
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司的发起人应当承担下列责任：

　　（一）公司不能成立时，对设立行为所产生的债务和费用负连带责任；

　　（二）公司不能成立时，对认股人已缴纳的股款，负返还股款并加算银行同期存款利息的连带责任；

　　（三）在公司设立过程中，由于发起人的过失致使公司利益受到损害的，应当对公司承担赔偿责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十五条
law_content: When a limited liability company is converted into a joint-stock limited company, the total amount of paid-in capital shall not exceed the net assets of the company. When a limited liability company is converted into a joint-stock limited company for the purpose of increasing capital and publicly issuing shares, it shall be processed in accordance with the law.
zh_law_content: 有限责任公司变更为股份有限公司时，折合的实收股本总额不得高于公司净资产额。有限责任公司变更为股份有限公司，为增加资本公开发行股份时，应当依法办理。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十六条
law_content: A limited liability company shall keep the company's articles of association, shareholder registry, stubs of company bonds, minutes of shareholder meetings, minutes of board of directors meetings, minutes of supervisor meetings, and financial accounting reports in its possession.
zh_law_content: 股份有限公司应当将公司章程、股东名册、公司债券存根、股东大会会议记录、董事会会议记录、监事会会议记录、财务会计报告置备于本公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十七条
law_content:
Shareholders have the right to access the company's articles of association, shareholder register, company bond stubs, records of shareholder meetings, resolutions of the board of directors, resolutions of the supervisory board, and financial and accounting reports, and to make suggestions or inquiries regarding the company's operations.

Section 2: Shareholders' Meeting
zh_law_content:
股东有权查阅公司章程、股东名册、公司债券存根、股东大会会议记录、董事会会议决议、监事会会议决议、财务会计报告，对公司的经营提出建议或者质询。

　　第二节 股东大会

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十八条
law_content: The shareholders' general meeting of a limited liability company is composed of all shareholders. The general meeting is the governing body of the company and exercise its authority in accordance with this law.
zh_law_content: 股份有限公司股东大会由全体股东组成。股东大会是公司的权力机构，依照本法行使职权。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第九十九条
law_content: Article 37, paragraph 1 of this Law, which concerns the powers of the shareholders' meeting of a limited liability company, shall apply to the general meeting of shareholders of a joint stock limited company.
zh_law_content: 本法第三十七条 第一款关于有限责任公司股东会职权的规定，适用于股份有限公司股东大会。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百条
zh_law_content:
股东大会应当每年召开一次年会。有下列情形之一的，应当在两个月内召开临时股东大会：

　　（一）董事人数不足本法规定人数或者公司章程所定人数的三分之二时；

　　（二）公司未弥补的亏损达实收股本总额三分之一时；

　　（三）单独或者合计持有公司百分之十以上股份的股东请求时；

　　（四）董事会认为必要时；

　　（五）监事会提议召开时；

　　（六）公司章程规定的其他情形。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零一条
law_content:
Shareholders' meetings are convened by the board of directors, and chaired by the chairman of the board; if the chairman of the board is unable or unwilling to perform his duties, the vice chairman shall preside; if the vice chairman is unable or unwilling to perform his duties, a director shall be elected by a majority of the directors to preside.

If the board of directors is unable or unwilling to fulfill its responsibilities to convene shareholders' meetings, the supervisory board shall promptly convene and preside over the meetings; if the supervisory board fails to convene and preside over the meetings, shareholders who individually or collectively hold more than ten percent of the company's shares for a period of ninety consecutive days or more can convene and preside over the meetings themselves.
zh_law_content:
股东大会会议由董事会召集，董事长主持；董事长不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由副董事长主持；副董事长不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由半数以上董事共同推举一名董事主持。

　　董事会不能履行或者不履行召集股东大会会议职责的，监事会应当及时召集和主持；监事会不召集和主持的，连续九十日以上单独或者合计持有公司百分之十以上股份的股东可以自行召集和主持。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零二条
law_content:
The shareholders' general meeting shall notify shareholders of the time, place, and matters to be deliberated at the meeting at least twenty days prior to the meeting; for an extraordinary shareholders' general meeting, shareholders shall be notified at least fifteen days prior to the meeting; for the issuance of bearer shares, the time, place, and matters to be deliberated at the meeting shall be announced at least thirty days prior to the meeting.

Shareholders who individually or jointly hold more than 3% of the company's shares may propose a temporary resolution to the board of directors in writing at least ten days before the shareholders' general meeting. The board of directors shall notify other shareholders within two days after receiving the proposal and submit the temporary resolution to the shareholders' general meeting for deliberation. The content of the temporary resolution shall fall within the scope of the shareholders' general meeting's authority and have clear agenda items and specific resolution matters.

The shareholders' general meeting shall not make resolutions on matters not specified in the notifications of the first two clauses.

If holders of bearer shares attend the shareholders' general meeting, they shall deposit their shares with the company from five days prior to the meeting until the adjournment of the meeting.
zh_law_content:
召开股东大会会议，应当将会议召开的时间、地点和审议的事项于会议召开二十日前通知各股东；临时股东大会应当于会议召开十五日前通知各股东；发行无记名股票的，应当于会议召开三十日前公告会议召开的时间、地点和审议事项。

　　单独或者合计持有公司百分之三以上股份的股东，可以在股东大会召开十日前提出临时提案并书面提交董事会；董事会应当在收到提案后二日内通知其他股东，并将该临时提案提交股东大会审议。临时提案的内容应当属于股东大会职权范围，并有明确议题和具体决议事项。

　　股东大会不得对前两款通知中未列明的事项作出决议。

　　无记名股票持有人出席股东大会会议的，应当于会议召开五日前至股东大会闭会时将股票交存于公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零三条
law_content:
Shareholders attending the shareholders' meeting have one voting right for each share held. However, the company's own shares do not carry voting rights.

Resolutions of the shareholders' meeting must be passed by a majority of the voting rights held by the attending shareholders. However, resolutions to amend the company's articles of association, increase or decrease registered capital, as well as resolutions for company mergers, spin-offs, dissolution, or change of corporate form, must be passed by two-thirds or more of the voting rights held by the attending shareholders.
zh_law_content:
股东出席股东大会会议，所持每一股份有一表决权。但是，公司持有的本公司股份没有表决权。

　　股东大会作出决议，必须经出席会议的股东所持表决权过半数通过。但是，股东大会作出修改公司章程、增加或者减少注册资本的决议，以及公司合并、分立、解散或者变更公司形式的决议，必须经出席会议的股东所持表决权的三分之二以上通过。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零四条
law_content: According to the Company Law and the Articles of Association, if the transfer or acquisition of significant assets or provision of guarantees to external parties by the company requires a resolution of the shareholders' general meeting, the board of directors shall promptly convene a meeting of the shareholders' general meeting for a vote on the aforementioned matters.
zh_law_content: 本法和公司章程规定公司转让、受让重大资产或者对外提供担保等事项必须经股东大会作出决议的，董事会应当及时召集股东大会会议，由股东大会就上述事项进行表决。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零五条
law_content:
The election of directors and supervisors at shareholders' meetings can be conducted under the cumulative voting system, as provided in the company's articles of association or by resolution of the shareholders' meeting.

The term "cumulative voting system" referred to in this Law means that when shareholders' meetings elect directors or supervisors, each share is entitled to the same number of votes as the number of directors or supervisors to be elected, and shareholders can consolidate their voting rights.
zh_law_content:
股东大会选举董事、监事，可以依照公司章程的规定或者股东大会的决议，实行累积投票制。

　　本法所称累积投票制，是指股东大会选举董事或者监事时，每一股份拥有与应选董事或者监事人数相同的表决权，股东拥有的表决权可以集中使用。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零六条
law_content: Shareholders can delegate agents to attend shareholder meetings. The agents should submit a power of attorney to the company and exercise voting rights within the authorized scope.
zh_law_content: 股东可以委托代理人出席股东大会会议，代理人应当向公司提交股东授权委托书，并在授权范围内行使表决权。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零七条
law_content:
The decisions on the agenda of the shareholders' meeting shall be recorded in the meeting minutes, which shall be signed by the chairman and the attending directors. The meeting minutes, along with the shareholders' attendance register and proxy attendance authorization letters, shall be preserved together.

Section 3: Board of Directors, Managers
zh_law_content:
股东大会应当对所议事项的决定作成会议记录，主持人、出席会议的董事应当在会议记录上签名。会议记录应当与出席股东的签名册及代理出席的委托书一并保存。

　　第三节 董事会、经理

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零八条
law_content:
The limited liability company shall establish a board of directors with at least five to nineteen members.

There may be employee representatives in the board of directors, who are elected by the company's employees through employee representative conferences, employee meetings, or other forms of democratic elections.

Article 45 of this law, which concerns the term of office for directors of limited liability companies, is applicable to the directors of the board of directors of a joint stock limited company.

Article 46 of this law, which concerns the powers and responsibilities of the board of directors of a limited liability company, is applicable to the board of directors of a joint stock limited company.
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司设董事会，其成员为五人至十九人。

　　董事会成员中可以有公司职工代表。董事会中的职工代表由公司职工通过职工代表大会、职工大会或者其他形式民主选举产生。

　　本法第四十五条 关于有限责任公司董事任期的规定，适用于股份有限公司董事。

　　本法第四十六条 关于有限责任公司董事会职权的规定，适用于股份有限公司董事会。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百零九条
law_content:
The board of directors shall have one chairman, who can appoint a vice chairman. The chairman and vice chairman shall be elected by a majority vote of all directors.

The chairman shall convene and preside over board meetings, and oversee the implementation of board resolutions. The vice chairman shall assist the chairman in his/her duties, and in the event that the chairman is unable or fails to perform his/her duties, the vice chairman shall assume the responsibilities. If the vice chairman is unable or fails to perform his/her duties, a new director shall be elected by a majority of the directors to assume the responsibilities.
zh_law_content:
董事会设董事长一人，可以设副董事长。董事长和副董事长由董事会以全体董事的过半数选举产生。

　　董事长召集和主持董事会会议，检查董事会决议的实施情况。副董事长协助董事长工作，董事长不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由副董事长履行职务；副董事长不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由半数以上董事共同推举一名董事履行职务。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十条
law_content:
The board of directors shall hold meetings at least twice a year, and each meeting shall be notified to all directors and supervisors ten days in advance.

Shareholders holding more than one-tenth of voting rights, or more than one-third of directors or supervisors, may propose to hold an ad-hoc meeting of the board of directors. The chairman of the board shall convene and preside over the board meeting within ten days of receiving such proposal.

For ad-hoc meetings of the board of directors, the board may determine a different method of notification and time period for notification.
zh_law_content:
董事会每年度至少召开两次会议，每次会议应当于会议召开十日前通知全体董事和监事。

　　代表十分之一以上表决权的股东、三分之一以上董事或者监事会，可以提议召开董事会临时会议。董事长应当自接到提议后十日内，召集和主持董事会会议。

　　董事会召开临时会议，可以另定召集董事会的通知方式和通知时限。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十一条
law_content:
A board meeting can only be held if more than half of the directors are present. In order for the board to make a resolution, it must be passed by more than half of all directors.

A board resolution is voted on by each director, with each having one vote.
zh_law_content:
董事会会议应有过半数的董事出席方可举行。董事会作出决议，必须经全体董事的过半数通过。

　　董事会决议的表决，实行一人一票。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十二条
law_content:
The board meeting shall be attended by the directors in person. If a director is unable to attend due to unforeseen circumstances, they may authorize another director in writing to attend on their behalf, specifying the scope of the authorization in the authorization letter.

The board shall prepare meeting minutes for the decisions made during the meeting, and the attending directors shall sign the minutes.

Directors shall be responsible for the resolutions of the board. If a board resolution violates laws, administrative regulations, the company's articles of association, or shareholder resolutions, resulting in significant losses to the company, the directors who participated in the resolution shall be liable for compensation. However, a director who proves that they expressed dissent during the voting and it was recorded in the meeting minutes may be exempted from liability.
zh_law_content:
董事会会议，应由董事本人出席；董事因故不能出席，可以书面委托其他董事代为出席，委托书中应载明授权范围。

　　董事会应当对会议所议事项的决定作成会议记录，出席会议的董事应当在会议记录上签名。

　　董事应当对董事会的决议承担责任。董事会的决议违反法律、行政法规或者公司章程、股东大会决议，致使公司遭受严重损失的，参与决议的董事对公司负赔偿责任。但经证明在表决时曾表明异议并记载于会议记录的，该董事可以免除责任。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十三条
law_content:
The limited liability company appoints and dismisses the manager through the decision of the board of directors.

This Law applies to the powers and responsibilities of the manager of a joint-stock company.
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司设经理，由董事会决定聘任或者解聘。

　　本法第四十九条 关于有限责任公司经理职权的规定，适用于股份有限公司经理。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十四条
law_content: The board of directors can decide to have a board member also serve as a manager.
zh_law_content: 公司董事会可以决定由董事会成员兼任经理。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十五条
law_content: The company shall not directly or indirectly provide loans to directors, supervisors, or senior executives, whether through subsidiaries or otherwise.
zh_law_content: 公司不得直接或者通过子公司向董事、监事、高级管理人员提供借款。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十六条
law_content:
The company should regularly disclose to shareholders the remuneration received by directors, supervisors, and senior management from the company.

Section 4: Board of Supervisors
zh_law_content:
公司应当定期向股东披露董事、监事、高级管理人员从公司获得报酬的情况。

　　第四节 监事会

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十七条
law_content:
A limited liability company shall establish a board of supervisors, with no less than three members.

The board of supervisors shall include representatives of shareholders and an appropriate proportion of employee representatives, with the proportion of employee representatives not less than one-third, as specified in the company's articles of association. The employee representatives in the board of supervisors shall be elected by the company's employees through a representative assembly, employee assembly, or other democratic forms.

The board of supervisors shall have one chairman, who may also have one vice chairman. The chairman and vice chairman of the board of supervisors shall be elected by a majority of the supervisors. The chairman of the board of supervisors shall convene and preside over the meetings of the board. If the chairman is unable to perform his or her duties or fails to do so, the vice chairman shall convene and preside over the meetings. If the vice chairman is unable to perform his or her duties or fails to do so, a supervisor elected by a majority of the supervisors shall convene and preside over the meetings.

Directors and senior management personnel shall not concurrently serve as supervisors.

Article 52 of this law regarding the term of office of supervisors in a limited liability company shall apply to supervisors in a joint stock limited company.
zh_law_content:
股份有限公司设监事会，其成员不得少于三人。

　　监事会应当包括股东代表和适当比例的公司职工代表，其中职工代表的比例不得低于三分之一，具体比例由公司章程规定。监事会中的职工代表由公司职工通过职工代表大会、职工大会或者其他形式民主选举产生。

　　监事会设主席一人，可以设副主席。监事会主席和副主席由全体监事过半数选举产生。监事会主席召集和主持监事会会议；监事会主席不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由监事会副主席召集和主持监事会会议；监事会副主席不能履行职务或者不履行职务的，由半数以上监事共同推举一名监事召集和主持监事会会议。

　　董事、高级管理人员不得兼任监事。

　　本法第五十二条 关于有限责任公司监事任期的规定，适用于股份有限公司监事。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十八条
law_content:
Article 53 and Article 54 of this law, which pertain to the powers of the Supervisory Board of a limited liability company, are applicable to the Supervisory Board of a joint stock limited company.

The expenses necessary for the exercise of the powers of the Supervisory Board shall be borne by the company.
zh_law_content:
本法第五十三条 、第五十四条 关于有限责任公司监事会职权的规定，适用于股份有限公司监事会。

　　监事会行使职权所必需的费用，由公司承担。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百一十九条
law_content:
The board of supervisors shall hold at least one meeting every six months. Supervisors may propose the convening of an ad hoc meeting of the board of supervisors.

The deliberation and voting procedures of the board of supervisors shall be stipulated by the company's articles of association, except as otherwise provided in this Law.

Resolutions of the board of supervisors shall require the approval of more than half of the supervisors.

The board of supervisors shall make meeting records of the decisions on matters discussed, and the attending supervisors shall sign on the meeting records.

Special provisions on the organizational structure of listed companies.
zh_law_content:
监事会每六个月至少召开一次会议。监事可以提议召开临时监事会会议。

　　监事会的议事方式和表决程序，除本法有规定的外，由公司章程规定。

　　监事会决议应当经半数以上监事通过。

　　监事会应当对所议事项的决定作成会议记录，出席会议的监事应当在会议记录上签名。

　　第五节上市公司组织机构的特别规定

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百二十条
law_content: According to this law firm, "上市公司" refers to a public limited company whose shares are listed and traded on a stock exchange.
zh_law_content: 本法所称上市公司，是指其股票在证券交易所上市交易的股份有限公司。

law_name: 中华人民共和国公司法第一百二十一条
